text: Harry is an American comedy television series created by Susan Kramer. The series stars Alan Arkin, Thom Bray, Matt Craven, Barbara Dana, Kurt Knudson, Richard Lewis and Holland Taylor. The series aired on ABC from March 4, 1987, to March 25, 1987. ==Cast== *Alan Arkin as Harry Porschak *Thom Bray as Lawrence Pendelton *Matt Craven as Bobby Kratz *Barbara Dana as Dr. Sandy Clifton *Kurt Knudson as Wyatt Lockhart *Richard Lewis as Richard Breskin *Holland Taylor as Ina Duckett ==Episodes== ==References== ==External links== * Category:1980s American comedy television series Category:1987 American television series debuts Category:1987 American television series endings Category:English-language television shows Category:American Broadcasting Company original programming Category:Television shows set in New York City
title: Harry (American TV series)
